about_the_game:
This Sugar Rush Pack includes 6 sugary Clothing Items, 3 sugary Wigs, 1 sugary Mount, and 1 sugary Pet.

The Sugar Rush Pack has the cutest collection of 11 candy-themed items that are so sweet, you could just eat them up! Watch out for cavities!


Pack includes:
  • Pink Ice Cream Outfit: Pink Ice Cream Twin Tail Wig, Pink Ice Cream Dress, Pink Ice Cream Leggings, and Ice Cream Gloves
  • Blue Ice Cream Outfit: Blue Ice Cream Twin Tail Wig and Blue Ice Cream Dress
  • Strawberry Outfit: Strawberry Party Wig, Strawberry Party Dress, and Strawberry Party Shoes
  • Ice Cream Scooter Mount
  • Sugardrop, the Gummy Bear Pet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or greater
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3GB video memory
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
